text: The Romance-speaking world, Romanophone world, Neolatin world, or Latin- speaking world, is the part of the world where Romance languages are important and commonly used, this includes Latin Europe and Latin America, as well as parts of North America and Romance-speaking Africa and Romance-speaking Asia. It includes the Spanish-, Galician-Portuguese-, French-, Italian-, Romanian- and Occitan-Catalan-speaking communities around the world. ==References== Category:Romance languages
title: Romance-speaking world
